sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PlannedTaskRecalculationExclusion</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Exclusions for Planned task recalculations</description>
        <name>PlannedTaskRecalculationExclusion</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PlannedTaskRecalculationExclusion = Class.create();
PlannedTaskRecalculationExclusion.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    isExcluded: function(gr) {
        var tableName = gr.getTableName(); 
        if(this.getExclusion(tableName)) {
            return true;
        }
        if( null != gr.getValue("top_task")) {
            var topTaskSysClassName = gr.top_task.sys_class_name;
            if( null != topTaskSysClassName) {
                if( this.getExclusion(topTaskSysClassName)) 
                    return true;
            }   
        }
        return false;
    },

    getExclusion: function(tableName) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord("planned_task_recalculation_exclusions");
        gr.addQuery("exclude_table", tableName);
        gr.query();
        if(gr.next()) {
            //gs.info("Table is Excluded from Recalculation: " + tableName);
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    },

    getExclusions: function () {
        var excludedTables = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord("planned_task_recalculation_exclusions");
        gr.query();
        while(gr.next()) {
            excludedTables.push(gr.getValue("exclude_table"));
        }
        PPMDebug.log("PlannedTaskRecalculationExclusion.getExclusions -> " + excludedTables.join(","));
        return excludedTables.join(",");
    },

    type: 'PlannedTaskRecalculationExclusion'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-11-07 13:45:24</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1064dbc29f230200598a5bb0657fcf0b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PlannedTaskRecalculationExclusion</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Planned Task_v2" source="com.snc.planned_task_v2">92ef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43f1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1064dbc29f230200598a5bb0657fcf0b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-03-01 22:02:36</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
